GSP29udnyku2u:7: na cādṛṣṭena vyavahāraḥ- tato lokottaraḥ sarvānubhāvī sambhāvyate /

GSP29udnyku2u:51: [ku.2.208] evaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ parato jñāyate anabhyāsadaśāyāṃ sāṃśayikatvāt aprāmāṇyavat /
GSP29udnyku2u:53: kadācidapi prāmāṇyasaṃśayo na syāt jñānatvasaṃśayavat; niścite tadanavakāśāt /
GSP29udnyku2u:55: ṇābhāvamavadhūya samānadharmādi darśanādevāsau; tathā sati tadanucchedaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29udnyku2u:56: [ku.2.209] atha pramāṇavadapramāṇe 'pi tatpratyayadarśanāt viśeṣādarśanāt bhavati śaṅketyabhiprāyaḥ- tat kiṃ pramāṇajñānopalambhe 'pi na tatprāmāṇyamupalabdham,

GSP29udnyku2u:82: pratyakṣeṇa tasya niścayāttasya ca sattayaiva niścāyakatvānnaivamiti cet- mamāpi pratyakṣeṇa liṅganiścayāt tasya ca sattayaiva niścāyakatvānnaivamiti tulyam /

GSP29udnyku2u:95: [ku.2.215] kaḥ punarasāvarthaḥ, yaḥ svapne 'pi nābhāsaḥ syāt? yadanupalambhe vibhramāvakāśaḥ, (77)
GSP29udnyku2u:97: anyathā hi tathābhūtasyāpi vyabhicāre sāpi na syāt /

GSP29udnyku2u:108: na hi śabda evānyatra gataḥ; amūrtatvāt /

GSP29udnyku2u:117: naitadevam; indriyāsannikṛṣṭatvādatīndriyādhāratvādveti cenna- idaṃ hyupādhyudbhāvanaṃ vā syāt,

GSP29udnyku2u:135: [ku.2.220] tathāpi tayā tathaiva pratītiḥ kartavyeti cenna- gṛhyamāṇaviśeṣyatvāva(ṣyāva)

GSP29udnyku2u:164: [ku.2.225] na cedevam; kuta eṣā pratītiḥ, idānīṃ śrutapūrvaḥ śabdo nāstīti?

GSP29udnyku2u:172: tasyāpi ca śravaso niḥśabdatve pramāṇaṃ nāsti /

GSP29udnyku2u:190: abhimānamātrāditi cenna, tathāpi śabdapradhvaṃsasyātaddeśatvāt, atyantābhāvasya ca kālaniyamāt /

GSP29udnyku2u:291: avaikalye, tvādīyenaiva vikalena bhavitavyamiti hīnasya na satpratipakṣatvam /

GSP29udnyku2u:296_1: dravyaguṇatvapariśeṣe saṃyogasamavāyayoranyataraḥ sambandhaḥ” iti cenna- bādhakabalena
GSP29udnyku2u:297: bādhake satyapi vā dravyatvāpratiṣedhe karmatvādīnāmapyapratiṣedhaprasaktau paraśeṣāsiddheḥ /

GSP29udnyku2u:314: tasmāt svaguṇaḥ paraguṇe vāyogyo na gṛhyate; gṛhyate tu yogyo yogyona /

GSP29udnyku2u:380: ākṣepata iti cet- kaḥ khalvayamākṣepo nāma?

GSP29udnyku2u:386: [ku.2.254] arthāpattirākṣepa iti cenna- vyaktyā[ktiṃ] vinā kimanupapannam?

GSP29udnyku2u:398: jātipratyāyanamapekṣata iti cet- kṛtaṃ tarhi śabdaśaktika(ktibhedaka)lpanayā; tāvataiva tatsiddheḥ /
